string-array.name: Questions
string-array.item: name;text;What is your name?
age;text;How old are you?
mom;text;What\'s your mom\'s name?
dad;text;What\'s your dad\'s name?
origin;text;Where are you from?
food;text;What\'s your favorite food?
operating_system;text;Favorite operating system? (Windows, Mac, Linux)
video_game;text;Best video game ever made?
religion;text;What religion are you?
crush;text;What\'s your crush\'s name?

string-array.name: Notifications
string-array.item: i honestly don\'t know;why you even bother
why are you;still here?
go ahead;uninstall me, you won\'t
hope you have a nice day..;..not
how did you even survive;{age} years?
hey there, {name};you\'re ugly
hey! what\'s new, {name}?;nothing? thought so
hiya! got any good news, {name}?;of course you don\'t, idiot
BREAKING NEWS:;{origin} is the worst place to live
ever had {food} before?;i hear they\'re really gross
wanna hear a joke?;{operating_system}
{video_game} vs barbies?;barbies every time
only little kids;play {video_game}
what\'s better than {video_game}?:fortnite
Message from {crush}!;just kidding, they\'d never DM you
guess who i found out is gay?;{dad}..surprised it wasn\'t you
i once ate {mom}\'s cooking..;..the dog finished it
your clothes;look ugly
guess what?;your hair looks bad today
do you really think;that you look half-decent?
no wonder;{crush} doesn\'t want to date you
i\'d rather drink soylent every day;than talk with you, {name}
{name} is;ugly
{name} is;stupid
{name} is;fat
{name} is;smelly
hey im running out of insults;send me a selfie for inspiration
did you know;that you\'re my inspiration for these insults?
if laughter is the best medicine;your face must be curing the world
i\'m not insulting you;i\'m describing you
surprise me;by saying something intelligent
i really wish that you\'d uninstall me;so i wouldn\'t have to deal with you
it\'s funny how an idiot like you;can carry something called a smartphone
brains aren\'t everything;in your case they\'re nothing
if you don\'t understand these jokes;i\'m not surprised
it\'s really impressive how someone;as stupid as you can be so confident
roses are red, violets are blue;i\'m pretty, what happened to you?
the last time i saw something like you;i flushed it
if ugly were a crime;you\'d get a life sentence
you\'re not as bad as people say;you\'re worse
you\'re the reason;that the gene pool needs a lifeguard
how do you tell people that you\'re {age};if you can\'t even count that high?
you\'re like monday mornings;nobody likes you
what\'s worse than dealing with homework?;dealing with you
i was thinking about you earlier..;..i was looking up local zoos
you\'re so fat;you could sell shade
you\'re the type of person;that would get hit by a parked car
DINOSAUR SPOTTED IN: {origin};..wait, it was just you being fat
sorry that i\'m so mean;just kidding
do you hear wind blowing?;oh, that\'s just your empty skull..
you know what works too well?;this app
know what\'s going too well? your life..;..jk that\'s a freaking train wreck
hahahahahaha;sorry was just laughing at you again
oh my gosh that is hilarious;sorry was thinking about you again
